node.title: The Olympic hopefuls who are relying on raw talent — not coaches — in their bid for gold
node.description: Australia's breakdancing community is getting ready to compete for selection with the sport set to make its debut in Olympic competition at the Paris Games in 2024, though there are no rules or set plan on how to earn a place on the podium.
node.content:
["Olympic events are traditionally rich in history.", "But for Paris 2024, there will be a new kid on the block \u2014\u00a0the sport of breaking.", "The style of dance was developed on the streets of the United States, coinciding with the birth of hip-hop\u00a0in the 1970s.", "B-Boys and B-Girls would battle it out on the streets, but official breakdancing competitions were still decades away.", "In 2018, the sport was trialled at the Youth Olympics.\u00a0When the International Olympic Committee (IOC) asked Paris to name new sports it would like to include, the 2024 Games host had breaking\u00a0at the top of the list.", "A faithful clique of breakdancers in Australia has\u00a0also been growing the sport, albeit underground, over the past two decades.", "Leah Clark is one of the originals. She\u00a0recently helped form the Australian Breaking Association,\u00a0to aid with the sport's development.", "
'Jam'\u00a0sessions \u2014 no training
", "\"When I started, there were\u00a0no classes for breakers,\" Clark said.", "\"There were jam\u00a0sessions and there were a couple of competitions, but literally we had to look on the vast videos on YouTube to actually figure out what we were doing.\"\u00a0", "", "
Breakdancer Leah Clark said Olympics hopefuls have already started taking their preparations seriously.(ABC News:\u00a0Brittney Kleyn)
", "She said people in the early days\u00a0used to exchange videotapes to check out how different crews were practising.", "While the technology has changed, dancers still learn to break the same as always.", "\"It's an individual dance and it's all about creating your own individual style and your own unique moves.\"", "
Catching a break in Paris
", "Breaking\u00a0was first in competition at the 2018 Youth Olympics in Buenos Aires.", "Due to its success, the sport will feature at\u00a0the\u00a0outdoor street stadium La Concorde\u00a0at the Paris Olympics in 2024.", "", "
La Concorde will host 'breaking' competition as the sport makes its debut at the Paris 2024 Olympics.\u00a0(Supplied: Paris 2024)
", "The competition will include a\u00a0men's and a women's event\u00a0\u2013\u00a016 B-Boys and 16 B-Girls will go head-to-head in solo battles\u00a0in which they\u00a0have to improvise to the beat of the tracks.", "Each attempt will be scored by a panel of judges.", "\"With the announcement of breaking coming into the Olympics, I think there's a lot of the next gen really taking things much more seriously now,\" Clark said.", "
Preparation a 'full-time job'
", "John Olis is based in Brisbane and hopes to qualify for the Australian team in 2024.", "\"It takes a lot of stamina, determination, all of that, and your creative artistry,\" he said.", "", "
John Olis\u00a0(right) say breaking competition is fierce in Australia.(ABC News: Stephen Cavenagh)
", "At breakdancing competitions, athletes are judged on creativity, style, battle essence,\u00a0character, energy and execution.", "When it comes to selecting the country's first Olympic breaking team, Olis said he believed\u00a0the green and gold will be spoilt for choice.", "\"[The next generation] they're really good, they're really something different,\" he said.", "\"They're eating, I don't know, a different type of cereal but they're spinning 10 times more \u2014 they're way stronger, more agile and way more focused.\"", "", "
Jacob Goodridge said he said community backing would help ensure the competition's inclusion in the Brisbane 2032 Games.(Supplied)
", "Jacob Goodridge, 34, also hopes to compete in Paris and said the inclusion of breaking in\u00a0Olympic competition was \"a long time coming\".", "\"I just always wanted to know what the human body was capable of\u00a0in terms of being creative and being athletic,\" he said.", "\"You have to practise a lot of gymnastic moves, a lot of flips, flares that type of thing, a lot of handstands, just building up those individual muscles.\"", "
What about Brisbane?
", "While medals will be awarded in Paris, breaking\u00a0has not been confirmed for Olympic competition beyond 2024.", "", "
John Olis says the stamina and artistry of Australia's young breakdancers is remarkable.\u00a0(Supplied: Conan Whitehouse)
", "Clark said breakers were hopeful, given the development of the dance community in Australia, it would\u00a0be included at the Brisbane Games in 2032.", "\"The fact that we've got such a massive amount of people who break in Queensland [and]\u00a0have represented internationally in the past, to have a platform that's in our hometown to be able to do that will be incredible,\" she said.", "Paris is the second Olympic host given the option of proposing additional sports for its Games, as part of the International Olympic Committee's (IOC) reforms of the Olympic Agenda.", "At the time of breakdancing's inclusion, IOC President Thomas Bach said: \"The four sports that Paris has proposed are all totally in line with Olympic Agenda 2020 because they contribute to making the programme more gender balanced and more urban and offer the opportunity to connect with the younger generation.\"", "All these are ideals make the perfect case for Brisbane, according to the city's breakdancing community.", "\"It'd be amazing, you know, all the best in the world coming to Brisbane,\" Goodridge said.", "\"If Australia gets behind us and supports us, as they need to, then we have a good chance.\""]
